trans-unit.source: Provides a set of properties, such as typeface or foreground brush, that can be applied to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder et sett med egenskaper, for eksempel skrift eller forgrunnen velgeren som kan brukes i en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: The text layout client provides a concrete implementation of this abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Teksten oppsettet klienten gir en konkret implementering av denne abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: This enables the client to implement text run properties in a way that corresponds with the associated formatting store.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at klienten kan implementere teksten kjøre egenskaper på en måte som samsvarer med tilknyttede formatering lageret.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the brush that is used to paint the background color of the text run.
trans-unit.target: Henter velgeren som brukes til å fargemerknader bakgrunnsfargen for Kjør tekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> value that represents the background color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> verdi som Representer bakgrunnsfarge.

trans-unit.source: Gets the baseline style for a text that is positioned on the vertical axis.
trans-unit.target: Henter grunnleggende stilen for en tekst som er plassert i den loddrette aksen.

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value of <xref href="System.Windows.BaselineAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En tallverdi av <xref href="System.Windows.BaselineAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture information for the text run.
trans-unit.target: Henter informasjonen kultur for teksten Kjør.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that represents the culture of the text run.
trans-unit.target: Verdien <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>som representerer kultur for teksten kjører.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets the text size in points, which is then used for font hinting.
trans-unit.target: Henter tekststørrelsen i punkt, som deretter brukes til skrift hinting.

trans-unit.source: Points are defined as 1/72 of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Punkt er definert som 1/72 tomme.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the text size in points.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer tekststørrelsen i punkt.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default is 12 pt.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 12 pt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text size in points for the text run.
trans-unit.target: Henter tekststørrelsen i punkt for Kjør tekst.

trans-unit.source: A DIP is 1/96 of an inch.
trans-unit.target: En DIP er 1/96 tomme.

trans-unit.source: As DIP increases the size of the text increases.
trans-unit.target: Når DIP øker størrelsen på øker teksten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the text size in DIPs (Device Independent Pixels).
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Double>som representerer tekststørrelsen i spenningsfall (uavhengige piksler).</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default is 12 DIP.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 12 DIP.

trans-unit.source: Gets the brush that is used to paint the foreground color of the text run.
trans-unit.target: Henter velgeren som brukes til å fargemerknader i forgrunnsfargen på teksten Kjør.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> value that represents the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> verdi som representerer fargene som forgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number substitution settings, which determines who numbers in text are displayed in different cultures.
trans-unit.target: Henter innstillingene erstatning som bestemmer som vises i ulike kulturer tall i teksten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.NumberSubstitution"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the PixelsPerDip at which the text should be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Får eller angir PixelsPerDip teksten skal gjengis.

trans-unit.source: The current PixelsPerDip value.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende PixelsPerDip verdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> objects used for the text run.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"> </xref> objekter som brukes for tekst kjøres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"></xref> objects used for the text run.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffect"> </xref> objekter som brukes for tekst kjøres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets the typeface for the text run.
trans-unit.target: Henter skrift for teksten Kjør.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A value of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the typography properties for the text run.
trans-unit.target: Henter egenskapene typografi for Kjør tekst.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunTypographyProperties"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A value of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunTypographyProperties"></xref>.
